title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 301.1 - Toll rates for single trip
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 301.1 - Toll rates for single trip

State Regulations

Toll rates established December 13, 1996, effective January
1, 2007, are as follows: Classification

One-way rate
1. Vehicles under five tons registered weight, including
passenger cars, commercial vehicles, taxicabs, motorcycles (with or without
sidecars), trailers and motorized bicycles
$2.00
2. Vehicles, five tons or over registered weight, including auto trailers
$2.00 per axle
3. Buses operating under franchise
$0.50

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
301.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
